Text.Name: LingShou_fanshi
Text.Desc: The pet will make an artifact backfire on its owner after a period of time, causing the Artifact Qi to be reduced by half. The effect is doubled for artifacts of Fire element, and halved for those of Earth element.

Text.Name: Modifier_LingChong_Heal
Text.Desc: With the spirit pet as company, the injury is recovering more quickly.

Text.Name: Modifier_LingChong_Stay
Text.Desc: With the spirit pet as company during training, the mental state is more stable.

Text.Name: Modifier_GlitterEyes
Text.Desc: Owns Dark Phoenix's Piercing Sight to be able to see through to an item's true features while at an auction.

Text.Name: Modifier_Shelter
Text.Desc: Drastically increases the Qi barrier and secret body endurance in a short span of time.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_RealPower
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the power of the artifacts and secret bodies.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_RealRecover
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the resilience, artifact Qi recovery rate and secret body True Qi recovery rate.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_RealWisdom
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the spell power, secret body attack accuracy, defense success rate, Qi barrier penetration and artifact suppression chance.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_RealShield
Text.Desc: Rapidly burns the source of life to stimulate the original Yaoguai force in order to drastically increase the artifact mastery, Qi barrier, and secret body power and endurance.

Text.Name: Modifier_YG_NormalPower
Text.Desc: The demon body increases the combat prowess and makes remold process faster. But driven by the wild nature, the cultivator's intelligence, learning speed and mental state will all be greatly affected.
